00014 const INT32 Dashboard::kMaxDashboardDataSize;
00015 
00021 Dashboard::Dashboard(SEM_ID statusDataSem)
00022     : m_userStatusData (NULL)
00023     , m_userStatusDataSize (0)
00024     , m_localBuffer (NULL)
00025     , m_localPrintBuffer (NULL)
00026     , m_packPtr (NULL)
00027     , m_printSemaphore (0)
00028     , m_statusDataSemaphore (statusDataSem)
00029 {
00030     m_userStatusData = new char[kMaxDashboardDataSize];
00031     m_localBuffer = new char[kMaxDashboardDataSize];
00032     m_localPrintBuffer = new char[kMaxDashboardDataSize * 2];
00033     m_localPrintBuffer[0] = 0;
00034     m_packPtr = m_localBuffer;
00035     m_printSemaphore = semMCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY | SEM_DELETE_SAFE | SEM_INVERSION_SAFE);
00036 }
00037 
00043 Dashboard::~Dashboard()
00044 {
00045     semDelete(m_printSemaphore);
00046     m_packPtr = NULL;
00047     delete [] m_localPrintBuffer;
00048     m_localPrintBuffer = NULL;
00049     delete [] m_localBuffer;
00050     m_localBuffer = NULL;
00051     delete [] m_userStatusData;
00052     m_userStatusData = NULL;
00053 }
00054 
00059 void Dashboard::AddI8(INT8 value)
00060 {
00061     if (!ValidateAdd(sizeof(INT8))) return;
00062     memcpy(m_packPtr, (char*)&value, sizeof(value));
00063     m_packPtr += sizeof(value);
00064     AddedElement(kI8);
00065 }

00075     m_packPtr += sizeof(value);
00076     AddedElement(kI16);

00155 void Dashboard::AddBoolean(bool value)
00156 {
00157     if (!ValidateAdd(sizeof(char))) return;
00158     *m_packPtr = value ? 1 : 0;
00159     m_packPtr += sizeof(char);  
00160     AddedElement(kBoolean);
00161 }
00162 
00167 void Dashboard::AddString(char* value)
00168 {
00169     AddString(value, strlen(value));
00170 }
00171 
00177 void Dashboard::AddString(char* value, INT32 length)
00178 {
00179     if (!ValidateAdd(length + sizeof(length))) return;
00180     memcpy(m_packPtr, (char*)&length, sizeof(length));
00181     m_packPtr += sizeof(length);
00182     memcpy(m_packPtr, (char*)&value, length);
00183     m_packPtr += length;
00184     AddedElement(kString);
00185 }
00186 
00196 void Dashboard::AddArray(void)
00197 {
00198     if (!ValidateAdd(sizeof(INT32))) return;
00199     m_complexTypeStack.push(kArray);
00200     m_arrayElementCount.push_back(0);
00201     m_arraySizePtr.push_back((INT32*)m_packPtr);
00202     m_packPtr += sizeof(INT32);
00203 }
00204 
00211 void Dashboard::FinalizeArray(void)
00212 {
00213     if (m_complexTypeStack.top() != kArray)
00214     {
00215         wpi_fatal(MismatchedComplexTypeClose);
00216         return;
00217     }
00218     m_complexTypeStack.pop();
00219     *(m_arraySizePtr.back()) = m_arrayElementCount.back();
00220     m_arraySizePtr.pop_back();
00221     if (m_arrayElementCount.back() != 0)
00222     {
00223         m_expectedArrayElementType.pop_back();
00224     }
00225     m_arrayElementCount.pop_back();
00226     AddedElement(kOther);
00227 }
00228 
00236 void Dashboard::AddCluster(void)
00237 {
00238     m_complexTypeStack.push(kCluster);
00239 }
00240 
00247 void Dashboard::FinalizeCluster(void)
00248 {
00249     if (m_complexTypeStack.top() != kCluster)
00250     {
00251         wpi_fatal(MismatchedComplexTypeClose);
00252         return;
00253     }
00254     m_complexTypeStack.pop();
00255     AddedElement(kOther);
00256 }

00264 void Dashboard::Printf(const char *writeFmt, ...)
00265 {
00266     va_list args;
00267     INT32 size;
00268 
00269     // Check if the buffer has already been used for packing.
00270     if (m_packPtr != m_localBuffer)
00271     {
00272         wpi_fatal(DashboardDataCollision);
00273         return;
00274     }
00275     va_start (args, writeFmt);
00276     {
00277         Synchronized sync(m_printSemaphore);
00278         vsprintf(m_localPrintBuffer + strlen(m_localPrintBuffer), writeFmt, args);
00279         size = strlen(m_localPrintBuffer);
00280     }
00281     if (size > kMaxDashboardDataSize)
00282     {
00283         wpi_fatal(DashboardDataOverflow);
00284     }
00285 
00286     va_end (args);
00287 }
00288 
00298 INT32 Dashboard::Finalize(void)
00299 {
00300     if (!m_complexTypeStack.empty())
00301     {
00302         wpi_fatal(MismatchedComplexTypeClose);
00303         return 0;
00304     }
00305 
00306     Synchronized sync(m_statusDataSemaphore);
00307 
00308     // Sequence number
00309     DriverStation::GetInstance()->IncrementUpdateNumber();
00310 
00311     // Packed Dashboard Data
00312     m_userStatusDataSize = m_packPtr - m_localBuffer;
00313     memcpy(m_userStatusData, m_localBuffer, m_userStatusDataSize);
00314     m_packPtr = m_localBuffer;
00315 
00316     return m_userStatusDataSize;
00317 }
00318 
00324 void Dashboard::GetStatusBuffer(char **userStatusData, INT32* userStatusDataSize)
00325 {
00326     // User printed strings
00327     if (m_localPrintBuffer[0] != 0)
00328     {
00329         // Sequence number
00330         DriverStation::GetInstance()->IncrementUpdateNumber();
00331 
00332         INT32 printSize;
00333         Synchronized syncPrint(m_printSemaphore);
00334         printSize = strlen(m_localPrintBuffer);
00335         m_userStatusDataSize = printSize;
00336         memcpy(m_userStatusData, m_localPrintBuffer, m_userStatusDataSize);
00337         m_localPrintBuffer[0] = 0;
00338     }
00339 
00340     *userStatusData = m_userStatusData;
00341     *userStatusDataSize = m_userStatusDataSize;
00342 }
00343 
00347 bool Dashboard::ValidateAdd(INT32 size)
00348 {
00349     if ((m_packPtr - m_localBuffer) + size > kMaxDashboardDataSize)
00350     {
00351         wpi_fatal(DashboardDataOverflow);
00352         return false;
00353     }
00354     // Make sure printf is not being used at the same time.
00355     if (m_localPrintBuffer[0] != 0)
00356     {
00357         wpi_fatal(DashboardDataCollision);
00358         return false;
00359     }
00360     return true;
00361 }
00362 
00366 void Dashboard::AddedElement(Type type)
00367 {
00368     if(IsArrayRoot())
00369     {
00370         if (m_arrayElementCount.back() == 0)
00371         {
00372             m_expectedArrayElementType.push_back(type);
00373         }
00374         else
00375         {
00376             if (type != m_expectedArrayElementType.back())
00377             {
00378                 wpi_fatal(InconsistentArrayValueAdded);
00379             }
00380         }
00381         m_arrayElementCount.back() = m_arrayElementCount.back() + 1;
00382     }
00383 }
00384 
00388 bool Dashboard::IsArrayRoot(void)
00389 {
00390     return !m_complexTypeStack.empty() && m_complexTypeStack.top() == kArray;
00391 }
